Shadimus listened to Malice- giving his idea due
credence, before replying to what Rodimus had to say.
"Rodimus, Primus has given me the location of the
Matrix. As for your idea Malice, we need to make sure
that the theory about Unicron is correct. If it is
then destryoing him here would have minimal effect on
our timeline. In short, we need more information
before we can decide on a strategy. I must commune
with Primus. As for joining your team to recover the
Matrix, I will go, as Primus has already given me its
location. And from what I was told by him before being
sent back from the Matrix. However, you aren't going
to like what I have to tell you regarding it."

 --- robert riley <bustercross365@...> wrote: >
Malice thought as the others talked.  Then he got an
> idea.
> "Hey, Tripredacus guy!  Can you change your weapon
> so it will repulse him instead of damage him?  If we
> harness enough energy, and we catch him off guard,
> we could shove him back through the rift.  Then all
> we would have to do is seal the instablility."
> He was worked up, the plan would work... if a few
> things happened right.  One, securing a large enough
> energy supply for Malice, two, a way to get energy
> to Malice, and three, get energy from said bounty
> hunter to the repulser.
> "Please! We have to try this!  It will work!"
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
> Nighlight:
> 
> "And we must be quick to act before he arrived to
> Earth "replied the 
> femme 
> 
> Windlord looked her and he said to rodimus "So will
> be good idea ask 
> to BlackFang to come? or someone else that is in
> Cr's?"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen

> wrote:

> >

> Unicron. I think 
> he is coming from our time, through the transwarp
> rift. The space 
> gun is worth a shot but I have thought about the
> Matrix. We believe 
> it's lost on cybertron. I want a multi-faction team
> to go after it.
> >
